sentence.Network_en: There have been growing signs of a ra-pprochement with Vietnam.
sentence.Network_cn: 同越南恢复友好关系的迹象越来越明显了。

sentence.Network_en: Jones himself was a curious mixture of ra-dicalism and conservatism.
sentence.Network_cn: 琼斯自己是个奇特的混合体，既保守又激进。

sentence.Network_en: We ask this through our Lord, Amen.

means.word_mean: 1. Egyptian sun god; supreme god of the universe in whom Amen and Ra were combined; principal deity during Theban supremacy
